domain.step_1.title: What product type do you use?
domain.step_2.title: What type of problem have you encountered?
domain.step_2.contact_support: If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please contact our tech support:
domain.step_2.resolved.with_filter_updates: We recommend enabling automatic filter updates. Thank you for using AdGuard!
domain.step_2.resolved.with_disabling_user_filt: One or more rules from the User filter causes the problem. Disable them, or contact the support if you struggle to find the culprit. Thank you for using AdGuard!
domain.step_2.resolved.with_enabling_HTTPS_filt: HTTPS filtering is crucial for quality ad blocking. If enabling it causes any other issues, please contact the support. Thank for using AdGuard!
domain.step_2.resolved.default: Great! Thank you for using AdGuard!
domain.step_2.provide_other_extensions_info: Please include names of other extensions or anti-virus software that you are using below, if there are any.
domain.step_3.title: Where did you encounter the problem?
domain.step_3.contact_support: If you encountered the problem anywhere else, please contact our tech support:
domain.step_3.web.above_url_input: Please enter the full URL of the web page you had encountered the problem on:
domain.step_3.app.how_to_get_url: Please enter the full link to the Google Play app you had encountered the problem in. To do so, open the app in Google Play, scroll down, tap on 'Share' button and choose 'Copy to clipboard'. Then paste to the text field below.
domain.step_3.app.url_placeholder: Enter Google Play app URL here...
domain.step_3.web.datacomp_enabled: Is the data compression in your browser enabled?
domain.step_3.web.is_url_nsfw: This url is not safe for work
domain.step_4.title: What filters do you have enabled?
App configuration
domain.config.wfp_enabled: Do you have WFP driver enabled in Adguard network settings?
domain.config.stealth_enabled: Do you have Stealth Mode enabled?
domain.config.win.mark_stealth_options_below: Please mark any of these options if you have them enabled in Stealth Mode
domain.config.android.select_filtering_mode: Do you use VPN or HTTP proxy mode?
domain.config.android.select_filtering_method: What filtering method do you use?
domain.config.ios.is_simplified_filt_enabled: Do you use Simplified filters mode?
domain.config.ios.what_DNS_server_do_you_use: What DNS server do you use?
domain.step_5.title: Submit a screenshot
domain.step_5.please_take_a_screenshot: Please take a screenshot (or screenshots, if needed) of the problem and upload it to any cloud service.
domain.step_5.how_do_i_do_it: If you are unsure of how to do it, read our %ManualLink%.
domain.step_5.screenshot_requirements: When taking the screenshot(s), please keep in mind following requirements:
domain.step_5.please_highlight_screenshot: If it is unclear from the screenshot what the problem is, highlight it with an arrow/frame/etc;
domain.step_5.full_br_should_be_visible: The full browser window should be visible;
domain.step_5.entered_an_invalid_screenshot_URL: You have entered an invalid screenshot URL!
domain.step_6.title: Add your comment
domain.step_6.this_step_is_optional: This step is optional. Type in the text box below any information that you think is necessary for the developers to know.
domain.step_7.title: Check the information
domain.step_8.sub1.success: Thank you for reporting the issue.
domain.step_8.sub2.success: You can keep track of the progress of your report in the below link:
domain.step_8.sub1.fail: This could be a temporary network connectivity problem.
domain.options.checklists.filter_update: Please check Adguard for filter updates. Is the problem still present?
domain.options.checklists.disable_user_filter: Please disable User filter. Is the problem still present?
domain.options.checklists.HTTPS_filtering: If you don't have HTTPS filtering enabled, please enable it. Is the problem still present?
domain.options.stealth.x_client: Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests
